pages.text: × Did you know we do catering? Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from. Support local business Cheese PizItalian Stallion (toasted) Sandwichza. Review by - Yelp Ben P: In our opinion this is the best pizza in West Ashley. The staff there is totally on top of delivering a quality product with friendly customer service. Review by - Yelp Lance H: Late night food need, found the spot! Pizza was super flavorful. Cheese sticks were super crispy and gooey, perfect. But oh my the spinach salad with goat cheese and hot bacon, amazing... Review by - Yelp Rachael A W: In the mood for a baked sub and decided to check this place out. It did not disappoint. No complaints across the board... Review by - Yelp Gregory G: Fantastic place for a lunch during the week. I've been here about four times over the past months and get the lunch calzone special every time. The staff is polite...
